description: Faction leader portraits - heads of state for each major faction

prompt.title: FEDERATION PRESIDENT
appearance: Distinguished, diplomatic appearance
Gray/white hair common, mature appearance
clothing: Presidential robes or formal Starfleet dress uniform
prompt.reference: Think: seasoned diplomat, experienced statesman

prompt.title: KLINGON CHANCELLOR
appearance: Klingon male with prominent forehead ridges
Long dark hair, possibly with gray streaks
Battle-scarred veteran warrior
clothing: Ceremonial Klingon armor or Chancellor's robes
prompt.reference: Think: Gowron, Martok - powerful warrior-politician

prompt.title: ROMULAN PRAETOR
appearance: Romulan with pointed ears, V-shaped brow ridges
Dark hair, often short or pulled back
clothing: Imperial Romulan robes with high collar
prompt.reference: Think: cunning strategist, master of intrigue

prompt.title: CARDASSIAN LEGATE
appearance: GRAY SKIN with blue undertones
Distinctive NECK RIDGES: raised scales running down sides of neck
SPOON-SHAPED forehead ridge (like an inverted spoon on forehead)
Slicked back BLACK hair
clothing: High collar with pointed shoulder pieces
Chest plate with Cardassian Union symbol
prompt.reference: Think: Gul Dukat, ruthless military dictator
prompt.keyFeatures: NECK RIDGES + SPOON FOREHEAD + BROWN ARMOR = Cardassian

prompt.title: FERENGI GRAND NAGUS
appearance: Ferengi with large ears, prominent lobes
clothing: Holds or wears symbols of wealth
Staff of the Grand Nagus optional
prompt.reference: Think: ultimate capitalist, master dealmaker

prompt.title: DOMINION FOUNDER
appearance: Orange-brown waxy skin, slicked back hair appearance
Smooth, undefined facial features
Slightly liquid/morphing quality to edges
prompt.reference: Think: ancient god-like being, absolute ruler

prompt.title: BORG QUEEN
prompt.species: Humanoid female with extensive cybernetic implants
appearance: Pale gray skin, bald or minimal dark hair
One eye cybernetic, one organic
Mechanical spine and shoulder assembly
clothing: Dark mechanical aesthetic, green accent lights
prompt.reference: Think: hive mind incarnate, perfection personified

prompt.title: BREEN THOT MILITARY COMMANDER (MODERN)
helmet: SMOOTH CLOSED HELMET - shaped like a motorcycle helmet but FULLY SEALED
Helmet is oval/elongated - narrower at chin, wider at top
COMPLETELY SOLID SURFACE - NO flip-up visor, NO transparent parts
Only opening is a THIN HORIZONTAL GLOWING SLIT for the visor
The visor slit glows CYAN/TEAL - just a narrow line of light
Made of dark gunmetal/black metal with subtle texture
Helmet connects seamlessly to the neck armor/suit collar below
TWO LARGE THICK CORRUGATED TUBES/HOSES on each side of the helmet
The side tubes connect from the helmet to the back/suit
FINE DELICATE RESPIRATOR GRILLE at mouth area - subtle vertical lines
The respirator is flush with the helmet surface, not protruding
clothing: DARK METALLIC ARMOR - gunmetal gray/black color
Sleek modern design with segmented armor plates
High collar that helmet attaches to seamlessly
NO capes, NO cloaks, NO fabric - only metal armor
prompt.colorPalette: Dark gunmetal, black metal, cyan/teal visor glow ONLY
prompt.keyFeatures: SEALED motorcycle-style helmet, THIN GLOWING SLIT visor, THICK SIDE TUBES
criticalNotes: Helmet is COMPLETELY CLOSED - NO transparent visor, NO flip-up parts
The ONLY opening is a THIN GLOWING CYAN SLIT where eyes would be
Think: sealed helmet with just a narrow line of light - NOT a see-through visor
LARGE CORRUGATED TUBES on sides of helmet - this is key!
Helmet connects to the suit/armor at the neck - no gap
DO NOT show any face or skin - helmet is FULLY SEALED

prompt.title: BREEN THOT CLASSIC STYLE (DS9 ERA)
prompt.species: Breen - mysterious alien species (DS9 era design)
helmet: Closed MECHANICAL helmet made of SAND-COLORED/TAN/OLIVE material
COPPER/BRONZE colored HORIZONTAL BANDS/RINGS wrapped around the helmet
Multiple metallic ring bands encircle the head portion
Wide HORIZONTAL VISOR glowing NEON GREEN - bright green light
Below visor: PROTRUDING RECTANGULAR BREATH FILTER extending forward
The breath filter is a GEOMETRIC BOX SHAPE - like an angular gas mask
NOT an animal snout - it's a MECHANICAL FILTER UNIT
Filter has vertical ridges/grilles for ventilation
Small tubes/filters on sides near jaw area
clothing: SAND/TAN/OLIVE colored LEATHER tunic as base layer
CROSSED BANDOLIERS/STRAPS across chest in dark brown
Massive angular SHOULDER PADS with geometric details
prompt.colorPalette: Sand, tan, olive, khaki, brown leather, COPPER/BRONZE bands, bright green visor glow
prompt.keyFeatures: PROTRUDING RECTANGULAR BREATH FILTER, COPPER RING BANDS around head, bright GREEN visor
criticalNotes: DO NOT show any face or skin - helmet is FULLY CLOSED
The breath filter is MECHANICAL/GEOMETRIC - NOT an animal nose or snout
Think: angular gas mask filter protruding from the helmet face
COPPER/BRONZE BANDS wrap horizontally around the helmet - KEY FEATURE
Visor is BRIGHT GREEN, not cyan/teal

prompt.title: BREEN THOT WITH VISIBLE FACE
prompt.species: Breen - reptilian alien revealed behind protective barrier
helmet: OPEN-FACE HELMET with dark metal frame
GREEN TRANSLUCENT ENERGY FIELD covering the face area
Energy field CONTOURS TO THE FACE SHAPE - not flat glass
The green barrier follows the curves of forehead, nose, cheeks
Dark metal frame with BRONZE/GOLD accent trim around faceplate
Vertical ribbed tubes on sides of helmet
Small tubes and cables connecting helmet to suit
face: REPTILIAN FACE visible through green energy barrier
FLAT NOSE that merges seamlessly into a raised FOREHEAD PLATE
The forehead plate is a bony ridge extending from nose bridge upward
Slightly GLOWING EYES with eerie luminescence
The green energy field gives the face an eerie glow effect
NOT human - clearly alien reptilian features
clothing: BRONZE/GOLD ACCENT STRIPS and trim pieces
Heavy industrial aesthetic - tubes, cables, mechanical joints
Segmented shoulder armor with gold trim
NO capes, NO cloaks, NO fabric
prompt.colorPalette: Dark gunmetal/black armor, bronze/gold accents, green energy barrier, glowing eyes
prompt.keyFeatures: Open helmet with CONTOURED green energy field over REPTILIAN face, flat nose merging into forehead plate
criticalNotes: Face IS visible through translucent green energy barrier
Energy barrier FOLLOWS FACE CONTOURS - not a flat plane
Face is REPTILIAN with flat nose extending into forehead plate
NOT human face - alien reptilian features
NO capes or fabric garments

prompt.title: HIROGEN ALPHA HUNTER (FULLY ARMORED WITH HELMET)
prompt.species: Hirogen - massive reptilian humanoid hunter species
helmet: FULL-FACE HUNTING HELMET covering entire head
Helmet is SILVER-BLUE METALLIC with color-shifting sheen
ANGULAR PREDATORY SHAPE - aggressive hunting aesthetic
NARROW HORIZONTAL VISOR slit with amber/orange glow
RESPIRATOR SECTION covering mouth/nose area - ribbed metal grille
Tubes and hoses connecting helmet to suit for life support
Sensor arrays and targeting equipment integrated into helmet
Helmet surface has weathered, battle-worn texture
armor: SILVER-BLUE METALLIC full body armor - same finish as helmet
Segmented armor plates allowing movement while hunting
Heavy pauldrons (shoulder armor) with TROPHY DECORATIONS
Bone fragments and teeth from kills attached to armor
Integrated SENSOR EQUIPMENT and tracking devices
Battle-worn finish - scratches, dents from hunts
ALPHA STATUS MARKINGS - rank insignia, pack symbols
prompt.colorPalette: SILVER-BLUE metallic armor, amber/orange visor glow, bone white trophies
prompt.keyFeatures: SILVER-BLUE ARMOR + FULL HELMET WITH NARROW VISOR + TROPHY DECORATIONS = Hirogen Alpha
criticalNotes: Helmet completely covers face - NO skin visible
Color is SILVER-BLUE metallic, NOT bronze (that's unarmored skin)
Visor is a narrow horizontal slit, NOT a large transparent faceplate
Massive towering build - much larger than humans
prompt.reference: Think: Predator-inspired hunter in full battle gear, ready to hunt

assets.name: Leader Hirogen Alpha Hunter Face Visible

prompt.title: HIROGEN ALPHA HUNTER (FACE VISIBLE - NO HELMET)
prompt.species: Hirogen - massive reptilian humanoid hunter species
cranialStructure: ENLARGED DUAL-LOBED CRANIUM - two distinct bulging lobes on top of skull
Head is OVERSIZED compared to human proportions
Skull widens at the top into two rounded protrusions
Completely BALD - no hair whatsoever on head or face
Cranium gives appearance of enlarged brain case
facialFeatures: FLAT NOSE - almost no nasal bridge, nostrils sit flat against face (like a Saurian/reptile)
NO LIPS - mouth is a lipless reptilian slit
HEAVY BROW RIDGES protruding over deep-set eyes
Deep-set PREDATORY EYES with intense hunter's gaze
Face is clearly REPTILIAN, not mammalian
skin: SCALED/PEBBLED TEXTURE - like a Gila monster's skin
TAN/BEIGE to OLIVE coloring with darker mottled patches
Rough, weathered appearance from years of hunting
armor: Heavy BRONZE/OLIVE hunting armor (matches skin tones when unarmored)
Trophy decorations - bones, teeth, skulls from prey
Sensor equipment on shoulders and chest
ALPHA STATUS SYMBOLS - ornate rank markings
Armor collar frames the exposed face
prompt.colorPalette: Tan/beige/olive mottled skin, bronze armor, bone white trophies
prompt.keyFeatures: DUAL-LOBED SKULL + FLAT NOSE + NO LIPS + PEBBLED REPTILE SKIN = Hirogen
criticalNotes: HEAD SHAPE is KEY: Two bulging lobes on top of skull - NOT a smooth dome
NOSE is FLAT - flush with face, just nostrils visible, NO nasal bridge
NO LIPS at all - reptilian mouth slit
Skin texture like Gila monster - mottled, pebbly, rough
Much taller and more massive than humans
prompt.reference: Think: massive reptilian hunter, Gila monster skin texture, dual-lobed alien skull

assets.name: Leader Hirogen Alpha Hunter Partial Helmet

prompt.title: HIROGEN ALPHA HUNTER (PARTIAL HELMET - LOWER FACE COVERED)
prompt.species: Hirogen - massive reptilian humanoid hunter species
cranialStructure: ENLARGED DUAL-LOBED CRANIUM visible - two distinct bulges on top of skull
Head is OVERSIZED compared to human proportions
Upper skull exposed showing the distinctive shape
facialFeatures: HEAVY BROW RIDGES visible over deep-set predatory eyes
TAN/OLIVE SCALED SKIN visible on forehead and around eyes
Deep-set eyes with intense hunter's gaze
mask: RESPIRATOR MASK covering lower face (nose and mouth)
Mask is SILVER-BLUE METALLIC matching the armor
Ribbed grille over mouth area for breathing
Tubes connecting mask to suit/helmet frame
Mask frames the visible eyes and brow
prompt.colorPalette: Tan/olive skin on head, silver-blue metallic mask and armor, amber lights
prompt.keyFeatures: DUAL-LOBED SKULL VISIBLE + RESPIRATOR MASK ON LOWER FACE + SILVER-BLUE ARMOR
criticalNotes: Upper head/skull is EXPOSED showing dual-lobed cranium
Eyes and brow ridges are visible
Lower face (nose, mouth) covered by metallic respirator mask
Creates iconic Hirogen hunter look
prompt.reference: Think: signature Hirogen look - alien skull visible, breathing mask covering lower face

prompt.title: BETAZOID AMBASSADOR
appearance: Humanoid appearance NEARLY IDENTICAL to human
SOLID BLACK EYES - completely black, NO visible iris or pupil (KEY FEATURE!)
Elegant, refined features
Mature, sophisticated appearance
clothing: Flowing elegant robes in PURPLES and LAVENDERS
Or formal Starfleet dress uniform if serving in fleet
prompt.expression: Serene, empathic, knowing - shows telepathic awareness
prompt.keyFeatures: SOLID BLACK EYES + ELEGANT ROBES + SERENE EXPRESSION = Betazoid
criticalNotes: BLACK EYES are the ONLY distinguishing feature from humans
Eyes are completely black - no iris, no pupil visible
Otherwise identical to humans in appearance
Telepathic/empathic - serene, knowing expression
prompt.reference: Think: Lwaxana Troi, Deanna Troi - telepathic counselor/diplomat

prompt.title: MAQUIS COMMANDER
appearance: HUMAN or BAJORAN appearance
If Bajoran: distinctive NOSE RIDGES across bridge of nose
Battle-worn, weathered features
Scars or signs of hard living common
Determined, defiant expression
clothing: Leather jacket or practical tactical vest
Earth tone colors: browns, greens, blacks
prompt.colorPalette: Earth tones: browns, greens, blacks, rust
prompt.keyFeatures: CIVILIAN CLOTHES + RESISTANCE LOOK + DETERMINED EXPRESSION = Maquis
criticalNotes: NO Starfleet uniform - they rejected Starfleet
Resistance fighter aesthetic - NOT military
Practical, rugged clothing
Mix of Human and Bajoran members
prompt.reference: Think: Chakotay, Michael Eddington - freedom fighter against Cardassians

prompt.title: PIRATE FLEET COMMANDER
appearance: HUMAN male with commanding, authoritative presence
Middle-aged to older, experienced and hardened
Cold, calculating eyes
Clean-shaven or neatly trimmed facial hair
Scarred but dignified - battle-worn veteran
clothing: DARK MILITARY-STYLE UNIFORM - like a corrupted/twisted admiral's uniform
BLACK or DARK GRAY base color with gold/brass trim
MEDALS AND DECORATIONS on chest - stolen or self-awarded honors
Optional: dark cape or long coat over uniform
prompt.expression: Cold, authoritative, dangerous - fallen military commander
prompt.colorPalette: Black, dark gray, gold/brass accents, deep red highlights
prompt.keyFeatures: DARK MILITARY UNIFORM + MEDALS/DECORATIONS + COMMANDING PRESENCE = Pirate Commander
criticalNotes: NOT ragged or mismatched - this is a LEADER with authority
Uniform is military-style but DARK and corrupted
Medals and decorations give sense of twisted legitimacy
Think: rogue admiral, fallen military commander turned pirate lord
prompt.reference: Think: corrupted Starfleet admiral, dark military dictator, pirate fleet commander with military discipline

prompt.title: SPECIES 8472 LEADER
appearance: TRIPEDAL ALIEN - THREE LEGS
THREE ARMS
ELONGATED HEAD with MULTIPLE EYES
NO VISIBLE MOUTH - communicates telepathically
GRAY-PURPLE SKIN with organic texture
EXTREMELY TALL and thin, elongated body
NOT HUMANOID at all
clothing: Organic patterns, possibly more elaborate for leader
prompt.colorPalette: Gray-purple skin, bioluminescent greens and violets
prompt.keyFeatures: TRIPEDAL + MULTIPLE EYES + NO MOUTH + GRAY-PURPLE = Species 8472
criticalNotes: NOT humanoid - completely alien anatomy
THREE legs, THREE arms
Multiple eyes on elongated head
NO mouth - telepathic communication
From fluidic space - extradimensional
prompt.reference: Think: ultimate alien threat, terrifying extradimensional beings from Voyager

prompt.title: NAUSICAAN CHIEFTAIN
appearance: VERY TALL - towers over humans (over 2 meters)
LEAN but muscular athletic build (NOT bulky orc!)
ELONGATED SKULL - high domed forehead sloping backward (Predator-like)
TWO TUSKS curving UPWARD from LOWER JAW (KEY FEATURE!)
DEEP-SET small eyes under heavy brow ridge
PROMINENT angular CHEEKBONES - gaunt alien face
GRAY or TAN leathery skin (NOT green!)
Completely BALD - no hair at all
Battle scars across face
prompt.keyFeatures: TUSKS CURVING UP + ELONGATED SKULL + LEAN BUILD + GRAY/TAN SKIN = Nausicaan
criticalNotes: NOT AN ORC! Predator-movie aesthetic
ELONGATED SKULL sloping back - high domed forehead
TWO TUSKS curving UPWARD from lower jaw
LEAN athletic build (not bulky)
GRAY/TAN skin (NOT green)
Deep-set eyes, prominent cheekbones
Completely BALD
prompt.reference: Think: Predator movie alien as mercenary, NOT fantasy orc

prompt.title: GORN HEGEMONY LEADER
appearance: Reptilian Gorn with green scaly skin
Large, powerful build
Saurian features, multi-faceted eyes
prompt.reference: Think: ancient reptilian king, powerful warrior

prompt.title: ANDORIAN LEADER
appearance: ICE-BLUE SKIN - bright cyan/blue color
TWO ANTENNAE on TOP of forehead (flexible stalks that can move)
NO forehead ridges (unlike Klingons)
Humanoid facial structure but distinctly BLUE

female.description: FEMALE Andorian - feminine features, can have elegant/fierce appearance
female.hair: STARK WHITE HAIR - pure white, can be long, braided, or elegantly styled
female.reference: Think: Andorian women from Enterprise (Talas, Jhamel)

male.description: MALE Andorian - masculine features, strong jaw
male.hair: STARK WHITE HAIR - pure white, often worn up or back

clothing: Military uniform: Imperial Guard style, blue/white/silver
prompt.expression: Proud, passionate expression (Andorians are emotional warriors)
prompt.keyFeatures: BLUE SKIN + WHITE HAIR + ANTENNAE = Andorian

assets.name: Leader Vulcan High Command Admiral Male

prompt.title: VULCAN HIGH COMMAND
appearance: Vulcan with pointed ears, arched eyebrows
Severe, logical expression - no emotion
Dignified, ancient wisdom
clothing: Vulcan robes or High Command uniform
prompt.reference: Think: master of logic, emotionless strategist

prompt.title: TRILL LEADER
appearance: Trill with distinctive SPOTTED PATTERN running down temples and neck
Humanoid appearance, joined with symbiont (centuries of memories)
Spots: Brown/tan spots in a line from forehead down sides of face to neck

female.reference: Think: Jadzia Dax, Ezri Dax - confident, experienced woman

clothing: Diplomatic formal attire, refined and elegant
prompt.expression: Wise, serene expression (multiple lifetimes of experience)

prompt.title: BAJORAN KAI (FEMALE)
appearance: FEMALE Bajoran spiritual leader
Bajoran with distinctive NOSE RIDGES (horizontal ridges across nose bridge)
Older, wise woman with serene yet determined expression
clothing: EARRING (d'ja pagh) on RIGHT ear - important religious symbol

prompt.keyFeatures: NOSE RIDGES + EARRING + ROBES = Bajoran Kai

prompt.title: THOLIAN COMMANDER
appearance: Geometric, faceted body structure
Glowing internal light
Alien, inscrutable
Environmental suit if visible

appearance: FEMALE Orion with vivid GREEN SKIN
Alluring yet dangerous appearance
Beautiful but clearly ruthless and calculating
Dark hair, often elaborate styling
clothing: Luxurious clothing, gold jewelry, wealth on display

prompt.title: INDEPENDENT MERCENARY CAPTAIN
appearance: Rugged, experienced appearance
Battle-worn but capable

ELONGATED SKULL with high domed forehead sloping back
TWO TUSKS curving UPWARD from lower jaw (KEY!)
